name: BITTREX.com Paint It Dark Theme
description: Dark theme for bittrex.com cryptocurrency exchange with black and greys. Please send any bug reports or change requests using the "Send Feedback" button and I will try to update as soon as possible. Note: To change timeline chart to dark, click on the gear icon and select "Dark" under "Default Themes" Visit my website for more projects See also: Binance Paint It Dark Kucoin Paint It Dark BTC Tip: 1NenJ5mP4T5gbR9fsoGMDgDzWCiWXypAwG LTC Tip: LeowJ8pxiCsdDx5oBAGYco5sHEfXhpRsgz Doge Tip: DUDQKiB9zFFqFmyx64GuiR6rW9Cxzg1Viu
additional_info:

discussions.name: I don't love bittrex, but I do love this theme
